text: <@U027P3N2WMQ> It was a huge automated data pipeline project I did for a client. I believe it is still in use. Scrapes data from racing post, timeform, at the races and also the betfair sp data. The data and all the pipelines are hosted on Azure and I don't have access to them anymore. I'll see if I can find a pre-production schema

text: For the BHA site you don't even need a scraping script. The page makes calls to an API. Go to the network tab on browser dev tools, click Fetch/XHR and you can see the calls

elements.text: For the BHA site you don't even need a scraping script. The page makes calls to an API. Go to the network tab on browser dev tools, click Fetch/XHR and you can see the calls

text: Just copy the request headers for the call. The data will come back in clean json

elements.text: Just copy the request headers for the call. The data will come back in clean json
